title: Revelation in Seven Weeks: A Bible Study: Teacher's Manual
description: This is a must-have manual for those interested in guiding a group or taking a journey through the book of Revelation. It is designed to assist the Bible study leader as it includes the answers to the main study questions found in Revelation in Seven Weeks: A Bible Study and is to be used alongside it. There is vital information in this manual to help unpack this most misunderstood book of the Bible. It is designed to help you guide your group and to give further insight.The manual is a comprehensive, but not exhaustive, study.Containing rich facts and thorough coverage of Revelation, this eBook is recommended for the individual as well. This teacherâ€™s manual is something that no one studying Revelation should miss!
author: Jori Aguilar Sams
